bibl.note: Fait suite aux recherches de: Roger Rémondon, Atti dell'XI Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia (Milano, 1966); - de Roger S. Bagnall and K.A. Worp, BES 1979.
bibl.seg: Bagnall Roger S. and Klaas A. Worp, Papyrus Documentation in Egypt from Constantine to Justinian.
